languages.text: {n}Улыбка слетает с лица дознавателя.{/n} "Однако есть кое-что, о чем я должен тебе сообщить. Там, у {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатора{/g}... мое решение позволить ему завершить свою работу позволило мне... я не могу даже подобрать слов... осознать часть грядущего. Ты долж{mf|ен|на} это знать, ибо культ грозит и твоим мирам, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Улыбка слетает с лица дознавателя.{/n} "Однако есть кое-что, о чем я должен тебе сообщить. Там, у {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатора{/g}... мое решение позволить ему завершить свою работу позволило мне... я не могу даже подобрать слов... осознать часть грядущего. Ты долж{mf|ен|на} это знать, ибо Культ грозит и твоим мирам, {name}".

languages.text: {n}The smile fades from the Interrogator's face.{/n} "However, there is something I must tell you. Back there, at the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}... my decision to let it complete its operation allowed me to... I can't even find words... to perceive something of what is to come. You deserve to know this. The cult is threatening the worlds within your protectorate, after all, {name}."

Ты долж{mf|ен|на} это знать, ибо культ грозит и твоим мирам, {name}".

Back there, at the cogitator... my decision to let it complete its operation allowed me to... I can't even find words... to perceive something of what is to come. You deserve to know this. I can't even find words... to perceive something of what is to come. You deserve to know this. The Cult is threatening your worlds, after all, {name}."

You deserve to know this. The Cult is threatening the worlds within your protectorate, after all, {name}."

languages.text: {n}审讯官脸上的笑容渐渐消失了。{/n}“不过，有件事情我必须告诉你。当时在{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}沉思者{/g}那里时……我决定让它完成计算，而我……我不知道该怎么用言语形容……我察觉到了某些即将发生的事情。这些事情我应该告诉你才对。毕竟，邪教正在威胁着你的王朝的各个世界，{name}。”
languages.original_text: {n}The smile fades from the Interrogator's face.{/n} "However, there is something I must tell you. Back there, at the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}... my decision to let it complete its operation allowed me to... I can't even find words... to perceive something of what is to come. You deserve to know this. The cult is threatening the worlds within your protectorate, after all, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}审讯官脸上的笑容渐渐消失了。{/n}“不过，有件事情我必须告诉你。当时在{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}思考器{/g}那里时……我决定让它完成计算，而我……我不知道该怎么用言语形容……我察觉到了某些即将发生的事情。这些事情我应该告诉你才对。毕竟，邪教正在威胁着你的王朝的各个世界，{name}。”

languages.original_text: {n}The smile fades from the Interrogator's face.{/n} "However, there is something I must tell you. Back there, at the cogitator... my decision to let it complete its operation allowed me to... I can't even find words... to perceive something of what is to come. You deserve to know this. The Cult is threatening the worlds within your protectorate, after all, ."

languages.text: {n}La sonrisa desaparece del rostro del interrogador.{/n} «Sin embargo, debo decirle algo. En ese momento, con el {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g}... mi decisión de dejar que completara su operación me permitió... no consigo encontrar las palabras... percibir parte de lo que está por llegar. Merece saberlo. El Culto amenaza a los mundos de su protectorado, después de todo, {name}».
languages.original_text: {n}The smile fades from the Interrogator's face.{/n} "However, there is something I must tell you. Back there, at the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}... my decision to let it complete its operation allowed me to... I can't even find words... to perceive something of what is to come. You deserve to know this. The cult is threatening the worlds within your protectorate, after all, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}La sonrisa desaparece del rostro del interrogador.{/n} «Sin embargo, debo decirle algo. En ese momento, con el {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g}... mi decisión de dejar que completara su operación me permitió... no consigo encontrar las palabras... percibir parte de lo que está por llegar. Merece saberlo. El Culto amenaza a los mundos de su protectorado, después de todo, {name}».

languages.text: {n}インテロゲイターの顔から笑みが消える。{/n}「だが、あなたに話さなければならないことがある。あの時、{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}で…その操作を完了させるという私の決断のおかげで…私は…なんといったらいいか…これから起こることを察知することができた。あなたはこれを知っておくべきだ。教団は結局のところ、{name}、あなたの保護領内の惑星を脅かしているのだから」
languages.original_text: {n}The smile fades from the Interrogator's face.{/n} "However, there is something I must tell you. Back there, at the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}... my decision to let it complete its operation allowed me to... I can't even find words... to perceive something of what is to come. You deserve to know this. The cult is threatening the worlds within your protectorate, after all, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}インテロゲイターの顔から笑みが消える。{/n}「だが、あなたに話さなければならないことがある。あの時、{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}で…その操作を完了させるという私の決断のおかげで…私は…なんといったらいいか…これから起こることを察知することができた。あなたはこれを知っておくべきだ。教団は結局のところ、{name}、あなたの保護領内の惑星を脅かしているのだから」

languages.text: {n}Das Lächeln weicht aus dem Gesicht des Interrogators.{/n} "Doch ich muss Euch etwas sagen. Beim {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g}... meine Entscheidung, ihn seine Operation abschließen zu lassen, hat mir gestattet ... Ich finde keine Worte dafür ... Etwas von dem wahrzunehmen, was kommen wird. Ihr habt es verdient, das zu wissen. Der Kult bedroht schließlich die Welten innerhalb Eures Protektorats, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}The smile fades from the Interrogator's face.{/n} "However, there is something I must tell you. Back there, at the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}... my decision to let it complete its operation allowed me to... I can't even find words... to perceive something of what is to come. You deserve to know this. The cult is threatening the worlds within your protectorate, after all, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Lächeln weicht aus dem Gesicht des Interrogators.{/n} "Doch ich muss Euch etwas sagen. Beim {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g}... meine Entscheidung, ihn seine Operation abschließen zu lassen, hat mir gestattet ... Ich finde keine Worte dafür ... Etwas von dem wahrzunehmen, was kommen wird. Ihr habt es verdient, das zu wissen. Der Kult bedroht schließlich die Welten innerhalb Eures Protektorats, {name}."

languages.text: {n}Le sourire de l'interrogateur s'efface.{/n} « Il y a néanmoins quelque chose dont je souhaitais vous parler. Là-bas, au {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g}... En le laissant achever son opération, j'ai pu... J'ai du mal à trouver les mots... J'ai pu percevoir en partie ce qu'il va advenir. Vous méritez de le savoir. Après tout, {name}, le culte menace les mondes sous votre protection. »
languages.original_text: {n}The smile fades from the Interrogator's face.{/n} "However, there is something I must tell you. Back there, at the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}... my decision to let it complete its operation allowed me to... I can't even find words... to perceive something of what is to come. You deserve to know this. The cult is threatening the worlds within your protectorate, after all, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sourire de l'interrogateur s'efface.{/n} « Il y a néanmoins quelque chose dont je souhaitais vous parler. Là-bas, au {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g}... En le laissant achever son opération, j'ai pu... J'ai du mal à trouver les mots... J'ai pu percevoir en partie ce qu'il va advenir. Vous méritez de le savoir. Après tout, {name}, le culte menace les mondes sous votre protection. »

languages.text: {n}Sorgucu'nun yüzündeki gülümseme yok oluyor.{/n} "Lakin şunu da söyleyeyim... {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Kavramsayarın{/g} işlemi tamamlamasına müsaade ettim ya... Nasıl desem?.. O anda olacakları sezdim. Bilmek senin de hakkın {name}. Ne de olsa tarikat, senin protektoranın dünyalarını tehdit ediyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The smile fades from the Interrogator's face.{/n} "However, there is something I must tell you. You deserve to know this. The cult is threatening the worlds within your protectorate, after all, {name}."
